modName: Pick Up Wild Plants by Pressing E
modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to press E to pick up wild plants (like aloe, yucca, cotton, corn, etc.) that growing in the world.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod allows you to press E to pick up wild plants (like aloe, yucca, cotton, corn, etc.) that growing in the world. But It doesnâ€™t edit plants that the player grows. You still need to punch those in order to collect them.

**Installing:**  
Simply download the zip file and unzip it into your 7 Days to Die/Mods folder. Your full path should be **\\7 Days to Die\\Mods\\KHPickupPlants**

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-PickupPlants)** for A19  
**[Download](https://github.com/KhaineGB/Modlet-PickUpWildPlants/archive/master.zip)** for A18

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/8150-press-ltegt-to-pick-up-wild-plants-modlet/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
